casebody.data:
CARTER-HUBBARD
v.
WRMC HOSPITAL. No. 411A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2006. John M. Logsdon, North Wilkesboro, for WRMC Hospital. John S. Willardson, Wilkesboro, for Carter-Hubbard Publishing. Mark W. Merritt, Blake W. Thomas, Charlotte, for CMHA. Linwood Jones, Raleigh, for NC Hospital Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of December 2006 by NC Press Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of December 2006."
